pr_title: DPC-335: Verify public key with snippet signature

timeline.bodyText: Method uploadKey has 5 arguments (exceeds 4 allowed). Consider refactoring.
timeline.author: codeclimate

timeline.message: Accept key and signature as JSON
Accept signature with CLI key creation; skip ECC tests temporarily
Address Code Climate exception message issue
Change verifySignature() to throw an exception rather than returning false, to be consistent with other methods
